1.Name: NewsAnchor
1.Dialogue: We are sorry to bring you this news. Unfortunately, the psychotic alien, Vyzzar, has destroyed Mantle, Amourtia's fan-favorite newbie.

2.Name: NewsAnchor
2.Dialogue: It would seem that Harbinger's predictions rang true. Mantle is not the unbeatable hero we thought he was.

3.Name: NewsAnchor
3.Dialogue: Vyzzar now continues to wreck havoc on the innocents at Amourtia Hospital and is a danger to all. Heroes, if you're hearing this, please protect us.
